name: FREECELL BATTLE KING
description:
Battle play is exciting !

Clear speed is the key !

Sharing one unit,two Switches or online, enjoy the fun of competition with freecell !

The tasks are 3000 questions!

There are ordinary "KING Mode" and easy "MAY Mode".

Collect the "collection" by clears to color the game screen.

One-player is also enrichment !

There is also a mode that you can play easily.

Joy-Con or play with touch ! Play with your favorite style.
